name: Carrot
description: The carrot is one of the most cultivated products in the world. Its consumption is intended for human feeding in fresh, for cattle feeding and as raw material for the food and agriculture processing industries.

plantInstructions.title: Choose the carrot variety
plantInstructions.description: The first thing to do is to choose which type of carrots you are going to grow, which can be determined or undetermined. While determinate carrots have a compact plant, and limited growth, ideal for pots, indeterminate carrots grow continuously and need to be pruned periodically.

plantInstructions.title: Sowe the carrots
plantInstructions.description: carrots should be sown from winter onwards, and should be planted in a protected place, such as the interior of the house or in a greenhouse, preferably in a heated seedbed. The seeds germinate in 7-10 days.
plantInstructions.photoDescription: Small carrot plants planted in indoor pots

plantInstructions.title: Transplanting the carrots
plantInstructions.description: About two months after planting, the tomatoes should be transplanted to a place where the plants will be more separated, and with fertilizer with many nutrients.
plantInstructions.photoDescription: Transplanting a carrot plant from a pot to the ground

plantInstructions.title: Harvesting the carrots
plantInstructions.description: About 4-5 months after transplanting, the carrots will be ready to be harvested.
